generated_body: In the article titled "Cowboys have questionable red zone calls in loss to Vikings," the user may expect an analysis of the Dallas Cowboys' performance during their recent game against the Minnesota Vikings, particularly focusing on the decision-making in the red zone. Additionally, it could provide insights into how these decisions may have impacted the team's overall strategy and performance.
